title: Mediaeval monastery
brief_description: The general work and daily routine of monks in a medieval monastery. Stresses the importance of monasticism in the Middle Ages, distinguishes four main orders. Ground plan of typical monastery; uses of various domestic buildings illustrated by means of superimposed models. Also includes a day in the affairs of Buckfast Abbey, a modern monastery where the ancient rules of the Benedictine Order are observed.
